Class Product

java.lang.Object
ci553.ministore.catalogue.Product
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Product extends Object implements Serializable
Used to hold the following information about a product: Product number, Description, Price, Stock level.
Version:
2.0
See Also:
